rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0001
rows.name: We have to get back to the capital!

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0002
rows.name:
I know! We need to drive off the
Gargoyles before they do too
much damage!

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0003
rows.name:
Sending the Gargoyles in the advance
party? That's a coward's tactic. He
should be ashamed of himself.

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0004
rows.name:
It's cowardly, sure...but it's working.
The people in the capital are in total
disarray.

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0005
rows.name:
We have to do something to help,
and fast.

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0006
rows.name:
Comrades... Your haste to act is natural,
and to be praised.

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0007
rows.name:
But to pluck an unripe fruit is to taste
a bitter defeat.

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0008
rows.name:
His Majesty puts forth that we
shouldn't rush in without the
proper preparation.

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0010
rows.name:
Thank you both. Cool-headed thinking
is exactly what we need at a time like
this.

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0011
rows.name:
Let's make sure all our preparations
are complete before we head back to
the capital.
